app_description: A simple and convenient web application that allows you to mark your favorite places, as well as those you would really like to visit. So don't hesitate and try it yourself.

titles.add_photo: Click here to add a photo
titles.change_photo: Click here to change the photo
titles.delete_marker: Do you really want to delete the favorite place?
titles.select_location: Select a place on the map to add a marker.

errors.password_format: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.name_format: Name must be at least 2 characters long

metadata.description: A simple way to share IT locations

not_found: We couldn’t find the page you’re looking for. Don’t worry — our team is working on fixing it. In the meantime, you can return to the homepage or reach out to our support team. Thanks for your patience!
